code: import{CHANGE_LANGUAGE,SET_TOAST_DATA,SET_WALLET}from"./ActionsTypes";import translate from"../i18n/translate";export var toastMessage=function toastMessage(description){var title=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"GENERAL.ERROR_FETCHING";var status=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"error";return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_TOAST_DATA,toastData:{title:title,description:description,status:status}});};};export var setWallet=function setWallet(){var amount=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"0";return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SET_WALLET,amount:amount});};};export var setAuth=function setAuth(){var authenticated=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"0";return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:"SET_AUTH",authenticated:authenticated});};};export var changeLanguage=function changeLanguage(language){localStorage.setItem("Language",language);return{type:CHANGE_LANGUAGE,language:language};};
